channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- Device Guard
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- Device Guard

item.title: CVE-2017-11823|2024-09-17T03:14:35.829Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- device%20guard
item.description: The Microsoft Device Guard on Microsoft Windows 10 Gold, 1511, 1607, and 1703, and Windows Server 2016 allows a security feature bypass by the way it handles Windows PowerShell sessions, aka "Microsoft Windows Security Feature Bypass".

item.title: CVE-2017-8715|2024-09-17T02:46:30.679Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- device%20guard
item.description: The Microsoft Device Guard on Microsoft Windows 10 Gold, 1511, 1607, and 1703, and Windows Server 2016 allows a security feature bypass by the way it handles Windows PowerShell sessions, aka "Windows Security Feature Bypass".

item.title: CVE-2017-11899|2024-09-17T01:16:24.032Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- device%20guard
item.description: Device Guard in Windows 10 1511, 1607, 1703 and 1709, Windows Server 2016 and Windows Server, version 1709 allows a security feature bypass vulnerability due to the way untrusted files are handled, aka "Microsoft Windows Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability".
